name: The Week With Mario | Early Version
name_original: The Week With Mario | Early Version
description:
*Minor Gore Warning*

This is the demo version, so some things you see in this build might be subject to change. TWWM is a Fnaf/Fnas fan game that has been in development for 2 years now.

-Controls-

Mouse to scroll

A/D keys to close doors

F key to toggle flash light

Space key to toggle camera

Enter to toggle vent cams
